import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' const Question = (props) => { const { id, text, answer } = props.question let answered = "" const handleClick = (e) => { props.answerQuestion(e, id, answer) answered = `Correct Answer: ${answer}. You answered: ${e.target.value}` } return (

{text}

{answered}
) } export default Question
